com.github.valid8j.metamor

Interface MetamorphicTestCaseFactory<X,I,O,R>

  • Type Parameters:
    X - Type of "source value".
    I - Input type of the function under test.
    O - Output type of function under test.
    R - Input type of metamorphic relation.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MetamorphicTestCaseFactoryWithPreformer<X,I,O,P,R>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MetamorphicTestCaseFactory.Impl, MetamorphicTestCaseFactoryWithPreformer.Impl

    public interface MetamorphicTestCaseFactory<X,I,O,R>

    An interface of a factory for a metamorphic test case.

      • inputVariableName

        String inputVariableName()

        A name of input variable. This will be printed in the test report.

        Returns:
        A name of input variable.

      • inputVariableNameFormatter

        default IntFunction<String> inputVariableNameFormatter()

        In metamorphic testing context, the function under test is executed multiple times with different input values. The returned function renders input variable names so that they can be identified each other when an index is given. By default, it returns a function that appends the given index.

        Returns:
        A function to render an input variable name corresponding to a given index.

      • metamorphicMapper

        default Function<IoContext<InputResolver<I,O>,IoPair<I,O>>,Function<InputResolver<I,O>,IoPair<I,O>>> metamorphicMapper()

      • toMetamorphicTestPredicate

        default Predicate<X> toMetamorphicTestPredicate()

        A builder method that returns a printable predicate that examines the function under test.

        Returns:
        A printable predicate that examines FUT with a given metamorphic relation.
